verses.verse: For <WG1063> as touching4012, Ezekiel3 the ministering <WG1248> to <WG1519> the saints <WG40>, it is <WG2076> superfluous <WG4053> for me <WG3427> to write <WG1125> to you <WG5213>:

for <WG1063> I know <WG1492> your readiness <WG4288>, <WG5216> of which <WG3739> I glory <WG2744> on your <WG5216> behalf <WG5228> to them of Macedonia <WG3110>, that <WG3754> Achaia <WG882> hath been prepared <WG3903> for <WG575> a year past <WG4070>; and2532, 1537 your <WG5216> zeal <WG2205> hath stirred <WG2042> up very many of them <WG4119>.

But <WG1161> I have sent <WG3992> the brethren <WG80>, that <WG2443> our <WG2257> glorying <WG2745> on <WG5228> your <WG5216> behalf may not <WG3361> be made void <WG2758> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> respect <WG3313>; that <WG2443>, even as <WG2531> I said <WG3004>, ye may <WG3903> be <WG5600> prepared <WG3903>:

lest by any means <WG3381>, if <WG1437> there come <WG2064> with <WG4862> me <WG1698> any of Macedonia <WG3110> and <WG2532> find <WG2147> you <WG5209> unprepared <WG532>, we <WG2249> (that <WG2443> we say <WG3004> not <WG3361>, ye <WG5210>) should be put to shame <WG2617> in <WG1722> this3778, 5287 confidence <WG2746>.

I thought it <WG2233> necessary <WG316> therefore <WG3767> to entreat <WG3870> the brethren <WG80>, that <WG2443> they would go before <WG4281> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> make up beforehand <WG4294> your <WG5216> aforepromised <WG4293> bounty <WG2129>, that the same <WG3778> might be1511, 3779 ready <WG2092> as <WG5613> a <WG3779> matter of bounty <WG2129>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> of extortion <WG4124>.

But <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3588>, He that soweth <WG4687> sparingly <WG5340> shall reap <WG2325> also <WG2532> sparingly <WG5340>; and <WG2532> he <WG3588> that soweth4687, Esther9 bountifully <WG2129> shall reap <WG2325> also2532, Esther9 bountifully <WG2129>.

Let each man <WG1538> do according as <WG2531> he hath purposed <WG4255> in his heart <WG2588>: not3361, 1537 grudgingly <WG3077>, or <WG2228> of <WG1537> necessity <WG318>: for <WG1063> God <WG2316> loveth <WG25> a cheerful <WG2431> giver <WG1395>.

And <WG1161> God <WG2316> is able <WG1415> to make all <WG3956> grace <WG5485> abound <WG4052> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>; that <WG2443> ye <WG2192>, having always <WG3842> all <WG3956> sufficiency <WG841> in <WG1722> everything <WG3956>, may abound <WG4052> unto <WG1519> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>:
as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125>, He hath scattered abroad <WG4650>, he hath given <WG1325> to the poor <WG3993>; His <WG846> righteousness <WG1343> abideth <WG3306> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

And <WG1161> he that <WG3588> supplieth <WG2023> seed <WG4690> to the sower <WG4687> and2532, 5524 bread <WG740> for <WG1519> food <WG1035>, shall supply and <WG2532> multiply <WG4129> your <WG5216> seed for sowing <WG4703>, and <WG2532> increase <WG837> the fruits <WG1081> of your <WG5216> righteousness <WG1343>:

ye being enriched <WG4148> in <WG1722> everything <WG3956> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> liberality <WG572>, which <WG3748> worketh <WG2716> through <WG1223> us <WG2257> thanksgiving <WG2169> to God <WG2316>.

For <WG3754> the ministration <WG1248> of this <WG3778> service <WG3009> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> filleth <WG4322> up the measure of the wants <WG5303> of the saints <WG40>, but235, Exodus76 aboundeth <WG4052> also <WG2532> through <WG1223> many <WG4183> thanksgivings <WG2169> unto God <WG2316>;

seeing that <WG1223> through the proving <WG1382> of you by this <WG3778> ministration <WG1248> they glorify <WG1392> God <WG2316> for <WG1909> the obedience <WG5292> of your <WG5216> confession <WG3671> unto <WG1519> the gospel <WG2098> of Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> for the liberality <WG572> of your contribution <WG2842> unto <WG1519> them <WG846> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956>;

while <WG2532> they themselves <WG846> also <WG1162>, with supplication on your <WG5216> behalf <WG5228>, long after <WG1971> you <WG5209> by reason <WG1223> of the exceeding <WG5235> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> in <WG1909> you <WG5213>.
Thanks <WG5485> be to <WG1909> God <WG2316> for <WG1161> his <WG846> unspeakable <WG411> gift <WG1431>.
